overview: Andrei Borisov, a former special forces officer, lives a quiet life in the Moscow region after his dismissal. One evening, a girl comes to his house and tries to make an acquaintance. A few minutes later, unknown people attack Andrey's house and try to kill him. Andrew manages to fight off the attackers. He decides to take the girl with him to find out if she is connected with the killers, and who is behind all this. After interrogating the girl, he realizes that she has nothing to do with it, and now she herself is in danger. Andrei guesses that his past as a commando is to blame, and now he needs to find his former colleagues in order to solve the problem and stay alive. But all of them are killed in the last two days, and now you have to rely only on yourself.
title: Last Chance
